named-native-query.name: Vendas.totalPorMes
named-native-query.query: SELECT TO_CHAR(data_criacao, 'YYYY/MM') MES , COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM venda WHERE data_criacao > (NOW() - INTERVAL '6 MONTH') AND status = 'EMITIDA' GROUP BY MES ORDER BY MES

named-native-query.name: Vendas.totalPorOrigem
named-native-query.query: SELECT TO_CHAR(V.DATA_CRIACAO, 'YYYY/MM') MES, SUM(CASE WHEN C.ORIGEM = 'NACIONAL' THEN I.QUANTIDADE ELSE 0 END) TOTAL_NACIONAL, SUM(CASE WHEN C.ORIGEM = 'INTERNACIONAL' THEN I.QUANTIDADE ELSE 0 END) TOTAL_INTERNACIONAL FROM ITEM_VENDA I, VENDA V, CERVEJA C WHERE I.CODIGO_VENDA = V.CODIGO AND I.CODIGO_CERVEJA = C.CODIGO AND V.DATA_CRIACAO > (NOW() - INTERVAL '6 MONTH') AND V.STATUS = 'EMITIDA' AND (C.ORIGEM = 'INTERNACIONAL' OR C.ORIGEM = 'NACIONAL') GROUP BY MES ORDER BY MES
